useCase.name: Customer Makes Reservation

preconditions.precondition: Customer must have access to reservation system

failureEndConditions.condition: Reservation not made due to unavailability

useCase.trigger: Customer requests to make a reservation

mainSequence.step: Reservation system displays reservation form to Customer
Reservation system displays confirmation message to Customer
Reservation details are saved in Database
Database sends confirmation status to Reservation system
Reservation system shows reservation ID and details to Customer
